meanings.sent1: I enjoy checkmarking my completed tasks.
meanings.sent2: She always double-checks by checkmarking each item on the list.
meanings.sent3: The teacher had a funny way of checkmarking our homework.
meanings.sent4: His smile checkmarked the end of a successful day.
meanings.sent5: The bright red checkmark on the paper was a satisfying sight.

meanings.definition: The act of marking with a checkmark.
meanings.sent1: Checkmarking is a common way to indicate completion.
meanings.sent2: I noticed her careful checkmarking of the boxes.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with the sound of checkmarking during the exam.
meanings.sent4: The checkmarking of the ballots determined the winner.
meanings.sent5: The precision of her checkmarking impressed everyone.
